channel.title: Server is being spammed
channel.description:
Ok people have told me this many of times that they are having the same problem with their server....
I have gone into my client.java and searched for the invalidnames and entered ú because thats wat the spammers name has at the end of his name on the run.bat cmd prompt but on his char file and on the server his name ends with the europe dollar sign £ and i dont know wat to do...this guy has over 50 IP's and i have banned like 10 of them....
This is wat he says all the time
L.A.U.G.H.I.N.G. M.A.N. F.O.R.E.V.E.R but for some reason when i go into my chatlogs it says some other stuff with different languages like ü that 1....
Please help me....

item.title: Server is being spammed
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Please, leave your questions for private messaging, since this is not your thread and your posts are considered spam

Read full topic

item.title: Server is being spammed
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
@boxhad wrote:

Sorry dont understand that to well im kind of new to coding i know alot of coding but dont understand to much of what you said.

Read full topic

item.title: Server is being spammed
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

msg.contains(“£”)

Maybe?
Or, if you feel like writing, make a boolean return true for the String values a-z, 1-9 plus 0, and all the symbols (!@#$%^&*()-=[]{}|;’:",./<>?) then you could use:

allowedLetters();
if(!allowedLetters()) {
appendToBanned();
}

Of course, make it so it returns true if those letters are in the message.

Read full topic

item.title: Server is being spammed
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
@boxhad wrote:

I just noticed this and im basically having the same problem and when i add what the mod said it says (interface, or enum expected) and it says that when i compile what do i do? Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Server is being spammed
item.dc:creator: @BloodyVengeance BloodyVengeance
item.description:
@BloodyVengeance wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:5, topic:282078”]Either in your chat packet, or in your yell command add:

if (msg.startsWith("L.A.U.G.H") { appendToIpBan(); } [/quote]

Ok umm this is wat he says in my ChatLogs… e£n£j£o£y t£h£e l£a£u£g£h£i£n£g£m£a£n s£y£n£d£r£o£m£e[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 08:15:51 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Newty, post:5, topic:282078”]Either in your chat packet, or in your yell command add:

if (msg.startsWith("L.A.U.G.H") { appendToIpBan(); } [/quote]

OK nevermind thanks for your help Newty i finally got it fixed he stopped spamming me finally

Thank you all for your help (Even tho there were only 2 of you)

Read full topic

item.title: Server is being spammed
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Either in your chat packet, or in your yell command add:

if (msg.startsWith("L.A.U.G.H") {
appendToIpBan();
}

Read full topic
